pageProduct.name: Wagner Apple Cider Vinegar with Mother 120 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Formulated to support daily digestive vitality, this formula contains the essential 'mother', providing the equivalent 15ml per daily serve of naturally-fermented apple cider vinegar.  This powder contain Acetic acid, the active component of Apple Cider Vinegar without the taste and odour, in a vegan-friendly capsule

Warnings

If pregnant or breastfeeding consult your healthcare professional

Common Uses

Digestive Support

Ingredients

Ingredients: Apple cider vinegar powder, Hypromellose, bulking agents (241, 460)

Directions

Adults Take 1 capsule 3 time daily with food or as directed by your healthcare professional
